ATTRIBUTS.ITEM: BEGIN OF confirmed_objects, count TYPE td_count, t_status TYPE tt_status_list, END OF confirmed_objects `

ITEM.TEXT: Envoi message progression en arrière plan Oui 'X' ou 'N'
Event raised when specific message recieved
Event to handle objects status update (count raised)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA _run TYPE ts_run.
* Check Run_ID ASSERT NOT process_id IS INITIAL. me->process_id = process_id.
ASSERT o_categories IS BOUND. me->o_categories = o_categories.

ITEM.TEXT: Converti les donnée brute en donnée typé
Donnée brute à décoder avec CONV_RAW2DATA

ITEM.SOURCE: ` TRY. IMPORT msg = data FROM DATA BUFFER rawdata. **CX_SY_CONVERSION_CODEPAGE **CX_SY_IMPORT_MISMATCH_ERROR **CX_SY_IMPORT_FORMAT_ERROR CATCH cx_root. ENDTRY.
` IMPORT msg = any FROM DATA BUFFER buffer.

ITEM.TEXT: Delete all message for a process

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL METHOD _lock EXPORTING run_id = process_id EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 sys_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE failed. ENDIF.
DELETE FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = process_id.
CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = process_id ).
` EXPORT msg = any TO DATA BUFFER result COMPRESSION ON.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA: it_msg TYPE tt_msgs. DATA: it_sys_msg TYPE tt_msgs.
SELECT mandt msg_id category msg_data INTO TABLE it_msg FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = process_id. IF it_msg IS INITIAL. RETURN. ENDIF.
message_readed = abap_true.
it_sys_msg = it_msg. DELETE it_sys_msg WHERE NOT categ IN ygpl_mt_categories=>r_sys_categories. DELETE it_msg WHERE categ IN ygpl_mt_categories=>r_sys_categories.
SORT it_sys_msg BY categ. SORT it_msg BY categ.
IF NOT it_sys_msg IS INITIAL. handle_system_messages( it_sys_msg ). ENDIF.
IF NOT it_msg IS INITIAL. handle_specific_messages( it_msg ). ENDIF. ** Security delete * DELETE ygplmt_messages FROM TABLE it_msg.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA status TYPE tt_status_list. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <statut> LIKE LINE OF status.
decode_data( EXPORTING buffer = msg_data CHANGING any = status ).
LOOP AT status ASSIGNING <statut>. ADD <statut>-count TO confirmed_objects-count. COLLECT <statut> INTO confirmed_objects-t_status. ENDLOOP.

ITEM.TEXT: Message processing has failed (abort futher processing)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS: * <data> TYPE ANY, * <dt> LIKE LINE OF msg_cat_types, <msg> LIKE LINE OF messages.
DATA: * _data TYPE REF TO data, _has_failed TYPE td_boolean.
LOOP AT messages ASSIGNING <msg>. ** Get Categorie data Type * READ TABLE msg_cat_types WITH TABLE KEY cat = <msg>-categ ASSIGNING <dt>. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDIF. * ** Create specific data Type * TRY. * CREATE DATA _data TYPE (<dt>-type). * CATCH cx_sy_create_data_error. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDTRY. * ** Need to use field symobl * ASSIGN _data TO <data>. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDIF. * ** Convert stored information into this data type * TRY. ** IMPORT msg = _data FROM DATA BUFFER <msg>-msg_data. ** This command is refused by ABAP Compiler ** IMPORT msg = <data> FROM DATA BUFFER <msg>-msg_data. **CX_SY_CONVERSION_CODEPAGE **CX_SY_IMPORT_MISMATCH_ERROR **CX_SY_IMPORT_FORMAT_ERROR * CATCH cx_root. * _has_failed = abap_true. * DELETE msgs. * CONTINUE. * ENDTRY.
* Call external event handler RAISE EVENT handle_specific_message EXPORTING cat = <msg>-categ rawdata = <msg>-msg_data. ENDLOOP.
DELETE ygplmt_messages FROM TABLE messages.
*Raise exception if one of the message couldn't be processed IF _has_failed = abap_true. RAISE failed. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** FIELD-SYMBOLS: <msg> LIKE LINE OF messages. DATA f_obj_conf TYPE td_boolean.
LOOP AT messages ASSIGNING <msg>. CASE <msg>-categ. WHEN sys_categories-obj_conf. f_obj_conf = abap_true. handle_object_confirmation( <msg>-msg_data ). WHEN OTHERS. * Un expected messages ENDCASE. ENDLOOP.
RAISE EVENT objects_confirmed EXPORTING object_count = confirmed_objects-count status = confirmed_objects-t_status. CLEAR confirmed_objects.
DELETE ygplmt_messages FROM TABLE messages. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. * IF sy-subrc <> 0. ** ROLLBACK WORK. ** CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id ** cat = ygpl_mt_categori=>run_info ). ** RAISE failed. * ENDIF. * * COMMIT WORK AND WAIT.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** DATA: _msg TYPE ygplmt_messages.
CHECK NOT o_categories->is_valid_category( category ) IS INITIAL.
_msg-msg_id = _generate_msg_id( ). _msg-process_id = process_id. _msg-category = category.
_msg-msg_data = encode_data( message ).
GET TIME STAMP FIELD _msg-timestamp. INSERT ygplmt_messages FROM _msg. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL METHOD _lock EXPORTING run_id = run_id EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 sys_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE failed. ENDIF.
* IF _run-run_id <> run_id. DELETE FROM ygplmt_messages WHERE process_id = run_id.
COMMIT WORK AND WAIT.
CALL METHOD _unlock( run_id = run_id ).

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL FUNCTION 'ENQUEUE_EYGPL_RUN' EXPORTING mode_ygpl_run_info = 'X' run_id = run_id categ = cat * X_RUN_ID = ' ' * X_CATEG = ' ' _scope = '2' _wait = 'X' _collect = ' ' EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 system_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc = 1. RAISE foreign_lock. ELSEIF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE sys_failure. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL FUNCTION 'DEQUEUE_EYGPL_RUN' EXPORTING MODE_YGPL_RUN_INFO = 'X' RUN_ID = run_id CATEG = cat * X_RUN_ID = ' ' * X_CATEG = ' ' _SCOPE = '3' _SYNCHRON = ' ' _COLLECT = ' '.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_msg, * Adding Table Key for delete mandt TYPE ygplmt_messages-mandt, msg_id TYPE ygplmt_messages-msg_id, * End of key categ TYPE ygplmt_messages-category, msg_data TYPE ygplmt_messages-msg_data, END OF ts_msg `
tt_msgs TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_msg `
